text:
Determine the measure of one interior angle given the sum of interior angles ex 3

\begin{aligned}\n&\begin{array}{l}\n\frac{U_{1}}{0} \\\n\frac{0}{1} I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} \\\n1620^{\circ}\n\end{array}\\\n&4\n\end{aligned}[imath]\frac{U_{1}}{0} [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{1} I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} [/imath] [imath]1620^{\circ}[/imath]
